member.name: M:Loxodon.Framework.Localizations.Localization.GetText(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a message based on a message key or if no message is found the provided key is returned.

member.name: M:Loxodon.Framework.Localizations.Localization.GetText(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Gets a message based on a key using the supplied args, as defined in "string.Format", or the provided key if no message is found.

member.name: M:Loxodon.Framework.Localizations.Localization.GetText(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a message based on a key, or, if the message is not found, a supplied default value is returned.

member.name: M:Loxodon.Framework.Localizations.Localization.GetText(System.String,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Gets a message based on a key using the supplied args, as defined in "string.Format", or, if the message is not found, a supplied default value is returned.
